features: 【60% Compact Layout Keyboard】Ultra-compact layout makes you a neat desktop with your organized gears on, even folks have nothing to do with Minimalist will dive into its tiny practical design. Tips you might want to know is that keyboard without numpad is most FPS gamers’ choice, more spaces left for mouse movements.

【Light Up Keyboard】A variety of light colors and light modes to choose from, changeable breathing or permanent lighting mode. It can be great for playing the game at night even without light. You can also adjust the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit according to your preference.

【Professional Gaming Keyboard】All "core" water-resistant, triple protection design. Water-resistant keyboard prevents damage from spilled drinks or coffee. Anti-interference magnet ring, gold-plate interface and waterproof braid USB cables, guarantees stable data transmitting, and more durable than other PVC cables, not easily broken.

【Ultra-light Honeycomb Shell】Well-designed perforated honeycomb shell, the mouse can weigh up to 65 (+-5) grams, symmetrical ergonomics, suitable for left or right hand and different grip positions, more flexible and comfortable, and will not fatigue.

【Professional Gaming Mouse】The mouse uses high-precision optical sensor, sensitivity is 7200DPI, 12000fps scan rate, 1000Hz tour detection rate, can withstand 40G acceleration and 400IPS tracking speed, can meet your fast browsing and game requirements.

title: Cherry Stream Wireless Keyboard with SX Scissors Mechanism, Slim Yet Full Size QWERTY Ergo Friendly with Number Pad, Thin Design with Quiet keystroke for use at Home Office or Work. Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Keyboards, Mice & Accessories › Keyboards
features: Simple Setup – Easy install allows you to just insert USB receiver into computer and instantly start using the keyboard. No complicated setup or downloads. PLUG AND PLAY.

CHERRY STREAM WIRELESS KEYBOARD – is a 2.4 GHz encrypted keyboard that has everything you have come to expect from the CHERRY STREAM product family. For everyone who has been waiting for the CHERRY classic in a wireless keyboard version, the new STREAM KEYBOARD WIRELESS is now available.

CHERRY SX scissor technology – The STREAM family is known for its exceptional type feel. But what exactly constitutes a good typing experience? The precise manufacturing of the scissor technology with an exact, repeatable pressure point, supported by a rigid base, is essential. That quality feel must remain consistent over the life of the keyboard.

SILENCE – Whether working at home or the office, the typing noise level must not be disturbing to others whether they are on the phone or in the same office. A quiet typing experience has a positive impact on your working environment.

FEATURES – The wireless keyboard with 2.4 GHz wireless technology and AES-128 encryption makes tedious key searching a thing of the past. The convenience of a full-size layout with a number pad makes operation immediately familiar. Status LEDs located in CAPS LOCK, NUM, and SCROLL LOCK efficiently relay key status with a glance.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Cherry Stream - Wireless Keyboard 
The best STREAM ever – now with wireless freedom 
A wireless that will last, looks great, and is a joy to use? Here it is. With the CHERRY STREAM Wireless Keyboard you know exactly what you are going to get. It is both new and proven at the same time. After many product generations, the CHERRY STREAM KEYBOARD has been developed to absolute perfection. The STREAM, revised in 2019, is the best STREAM ever — and it is now also available as a wireless version. 
What makes a keyboard a really good keyboard? When it not only looks good, but also feels good when writing and typing at speed: very little noise, precise pressure points, the very best typing experience. Thanks to the high-quality and particularly precise CHERRY SX scissor technology, the STREAM keyboard offers you a new typing experience. 
With the Stream Wireless Keyboard sleek design and comfort can be used at Home Office or at Work. 
Key Benefits 
The reliability you are used to from the classic wired STREAM
Wireless and easy to use with your devices — without tangled cables
CHERRY SX scissor technology makes writing quiet and easy
Precise typing feel and quiet keystroke
Excellent ease of use and maximum productivity: reliable, durable, built to last
High-quality workmanship and stability: Does not slip and stands stable
High CHERRY quality standards and environmental goals.
JK-8550US-2 
A set for every eventuality: High quality and durable 
Thanks to CHERRY’s high quality standards, the STREAM keyboard delivers the reliability you are used to. In addition to their high degree of design and technology, they are also top quality. Th integrated metal plate and the stable support feet ensure that the keyboard stays firmly in position on your table, and does not slip with every touch. 
	
The keyboard – stable and flexible at the same time. 
The use of high-quality scissor mechanisms with a low key stroke ensures an ideal typing experience. Status LEDs integrated directly in each key provide information on whether the CAPS LOCK, SCROLL and NUM keys are activated. In addition, these keys flash to warn that the battery charging status is low. 
	
Adjustable Legs For Preferred Ergonomics 
Your fingers can easily get to work. Flat keys, precise touch, faster typing — and the chance to get more done. The keyboard is perfect for those who type a lot and who highly value comfort when working. 
Adjustable Rubberized feet for perfect slip resistance.

title: Redragon K580 PRO Wireless RGB Gaming Keyboard, 3-Modes 104 Keys Mechanical Keyboard w/Hot-Swap Socket, Dedicated Media Controls & Onboard Macro Recording, Linear Red Switch
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Gaming Keyboards
features: 3-Mode Connection - Geared with Redragon advanced tri-mode connection technology, USB-C wired, BT 3.0/5.0 & 2.4Ghz wireless modes which make the user experience upgraded to another level in all fields.

Upgraded Hot-Swap - The brand new upgrade with nearly all switches(3/5 pins) compatible, the free-mod hot-swappable socket is available now. The exclusive next-level socket makes the switch mounting easier and more stable than ever.

5 Macro Keys - There are 5 programmable macro keys(G1~G5) on the keyboard which can be recorded macros on the fly without any additional software required to be installed. Easy to edit and DIY your stylish keyboard.

Dedicated Multimedia Controls - The multimedia controls let you quickly play, pause, skip the music right from the keyboard without interrupting your game. Also, designed with a volume/backlight adjust wheel, it's easy to adjust volume or backlight brightness directly with the wheel in the upper right side of the keyboard. Very convenient and cool looking.

Pro Software Supported - Expand your options using the available software to design your own new modes and effects found on redragonshop. Macros with different keybindings or shortcuts for more efficient work and gaming.

description: Master your flow with the Logitech MX Keys S Combo for Mac, the ultimate keyboard and mouse combo optimized for macOS and iPadOS (6) with a dedicated Mac key layout, programmable functions for macOS via Logi Options+ (1), and matching Space Gray finishes that blend perfectly with your Apple setup. Wireless keyboard and mouse combines the power of the fluid, fast precision typing of MX Keys S for Mac with the precise, fast scrolling experience of MX Master 3S for Mac mouse. Product Details MX Keys S for Mac: Weight: 810 g Dimensions : 20.5 x 430.2 x 131.63 mm Rechargeable Li-Po (1500 mAh) battery Optional Customization app(1): Logi Options+ Important: FileVault might be enabled on your macOS computer, which could prevent you from entering your password at start or reboot when connected to Bluetooth. In this case, use the Logi Bolt USB Receiver (not included). MX Master 3S for Mac: Weight: 141 g Dimensions: 51 x 84.3 x 124.9 mm Rechargeable Li-Po (500 mAh) battery Sensor technology: Darkfield high precision Buttons: 7 buttons (Left/Right-click, Back/Forward, App-Switch, Wheel mode-shift, Middle click), Scroll Wheel, Thumbwheel, Gesture button Optional Customization app(1): Logi Options+ Both devices are compatible with macOS, iPadOS operating systems (6) Wireless Connectivity: Bluetooth low energy Additional wireless compatibility of these devices only with Logi Bolt receivers (not included).
features: Mastered For Mac: With a Mac key layout, a Space Gray finish, programmable functions for macOS via Logi Options+ (1), USB C charging, the MX Keys S Combo for Mac is a perfect fit with your Apple setup
Designed For Mac: This Bluetooth keyboard and mouse combo is fully compatible with Apple MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, iMac, and iPad models
Fluid Typing Experience: Laptop-like profile with spherically dished keys shaped for your fingertips; experience fast, fluid, and precise typing on this wireless Bluetooth keyboard for Mac
Scroll 1,000 Lines Per Second: Logitech MX Master 3S wireless mouse with MagSpeed, Logitech’s fastest and most precise scroll wheel (3) with an 8K DPI sensor that tracks anywhere, even on glass (4)
Smarter Illumination: Backlit keyboard keys light up the moment your hands approach this wireless keyboard for Mac; have more control of backlighting duration and brightness on Logi Options+ (1)
More Comfort, Deeper Focus: Both wireless keyboard and mouse are engineered for hours of work; stable keyboard with an optimum angle and mouse sculpted for your hand for better wrist posture
Connect To Multiple Apple Devices: Pair Logitech MX Keys S Combo for Mac with up to 3 Mac computers and iPads (6) via Bluetooth Low Energy and switch between them seamlessly at the push of a button
Made With Recycled Plastic: Plastic parts in MX Keys S Combo for Mac include certified post-consumer recycled plastic; 27% for MX Master 3S for Mac and 26% for MX Keys S for Mac (8)

manufacturerAttributes.value: The plastic parts in MX Keys S Combo for Mac include post consumer recycled plastic — 27% for MX Master 3S for Mac and 26% for MX Keys S for Mac* — to give a second life to end-of-life plastic from old consumer electronics and help reduce our carbon footprint.  *Excludes plastic in printed wiring assembly (PWA), FFC cable, cables, and packaging.
Did you know producing aluminum is energy-intensive? That’s why the aluminum plate inside the MX Keys S for Mac is made with renewable energy rather than fossil fuels. a lower carbon impact.

MX Keys S for Mac’ presets for backlit keys automatically adjust to the environment and turn off when not needed, resulting in optimal battery consumption. Low-power mode shuts off backlighting when battery is below 10% to extend power even further.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Designed for Mac 
MX Keys S Combo for Mac is optimized for macOS & iPadOS (1), offers a dedicated Mac key layout, and comes in matching Space gray finishes that blend into your Apple setup. 
(1) Device basic functions will be supported without software for other systems than macOS. 
A combo for speed & precision 
Pair MX Keys S for mac’ low-profile keys designed to improve typing speed and precision with MX Master 3S for mac’s 8K DPI track-on-glass (2) sensor and 90% less click noise (vs MX Master 3). 
(2) 4 mm minimum glass thickness. 
Previous page
Fluid typing experience 
Type with confidence and speed with spherically-dished keys shaped for your fingertips, minimizing the chances of a mistype, while increased key stability reduces noise. 
Scroll 1,000 lines per second & stop on a pixel 
The Magspeed scroll wheel is precise enough to stop on a pixel and quick enough to scroll 1,000 lines per second. 90% more speed in hyper fast scroll mode and 87% more precision in ratchet mode. 
Next page
Automate repetitive tasks 
Smart Actions in the Logi Options+ App gives you the power to skip repetitive actions by automating multiple tasks with a single keystroke. 
Use ready-made Smart Actions 
We included ready-made customizable Smart Actions (3) that automate the most common tasks. 
(3) Requires Logi Options+ app, available for macOS. 
Customize your workflow 
Use ready-made app-specific customizations, set tracking speed, customize individual buttons with Logi Options+ to optimize your workflow. 
Multi-computer, one flow 
Pair MX Keys S Combo for Mac to work on multiple Apple devices and transfer text, images and files between them(3). 
(3) Requires Logi Options+ app 
Smart illumination 
Backlit keys light up when your hands approach the keyboard and brighten or fade to suit your environment. Control backlighting in Logi Options+. 
Engineered for productivity 
The keyboard has a stable, low-profile design and the mouse is crafted for your hand. The included palm rest encourages a natural posture. 
USB-C quick charging 
The keyboard stays powered for up to 10 days on a full charge. The mouse lasts up to 70 days. Charge while you work using the included USB-C cable. 
Connect with up to 3 devices 
Easily switch between up to 3 Apple devices at the push of a button. Both are compatible with macOS, iPadOS. 
MX + Creative Cloud 
Get 1-month Adobe Creative Cloud subscription included with your purchase of MX Keys S Combo for Mac.

title: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse with Mouse Pad Ultra Slim Combo, MOOJAY 2.4G USB Quiet Compact Scissor Switch Keyboard Mice Set with Cover, 2 AA and 2 AAA Batteries, for Laptop/PC/Windows - Gray Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Keyboards, Mice & Accessories › Keyboard & Mouse Combos
features: 【 Wide Compatibility and Efficient Cordless Keyboard】The wireless computer keyboard preserving the keys of the numeric keypad, 11 multi-media keys allows you to instant access your music,internet,e-mail,volume,etc(The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac System). The full-size keyboard mouse wireless combo is compatible with Windows 2000/ XP/ ME/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 10/ 11 operating systems, Work well with devices which has USB slot such as Macbook, desktops, Chrome-book, PC,Laptop,Computer Smart TV.

【Strong and Stable 2.4G Wireless Connection】Wireless keyboard with mouse combo share the same Nano receiver (stored at the bottom of the mouse) without installing any additional software, plug and play. Powerful and reliable connection of wireless keyboard mouse is up to 10 m(393.7in). Keep your desk clean and tidy.

【 Silent 5 DPI Mouse with Mouse pad and Keyboard】Silent cordless mouse has 5 DPI levels (800/1200/1600/2000/2400). It is fast and precise, keep quiet while maintaining sensitivity. The attached mouse pad makes you more comfortable using the mouse. The wireless office keyboard’ s scissor switch keys provide less noise. Light and responsive tactile keystroke makes typing soft and comfortable.

【Super-Thin and Portable Design】Wireless computer keyboard is made by high quality ABS plastic. has 14.55x5.5x0.2in(37*14*0.5cm), 0.8in(2cm) ultra-slim body, which can save space and easy to carry. Kit keyboard and mouse wireless’s sleek design is super match with office desk. Perfect for bring out for business travel, office, home, library or other public occasions.

【 Keyboard Cover + Battery Included with 2-Years Warranty】 Long lasting basic AA and AAA batteries are included in the wireless keyboard and mice combo, battery life between 3 and 5 months(varies by usage conditions). The included cover can provide you with comfortable typing feeling and protect your keyboard from dust and liquid. If quality problem with wireless keyboard & mouse set occur within 2 years, we will replace the new one to you for free.

【Compatibilidad Amplia y Teclado Inalámbrico Eficiente】El teclado de computadora inalámbrico conservando las teclas del teclado numérico, 11 teclas multimedia le permiten acceder instantáneos a su música, correo electrónico, volumen, etc. El combo inalámbrico del mouse de teclado de tamaño completo es compatible con los sistemas operativos Windows 2000/ XP/ ME/ Vista/ 7/8/10/11, funcionan bien con dispositivos que tiene una ranura USB como MacBook, Desktops, PC, Computadora portátil.

【Conexión Inalámbrica de 2.4G Fuerte y Estable】Pack de teclado con mouse inalámbrico comparta el mismo receptor nano (almacenado en la parte inferior del mouse) sin instalar ningún software adicional, enchufe y reproducción. La conexión potente y confiable del mouse de teclado inalámbrico es de hasta 10 m (393.7in). Mantenga su escritorio limpio y ordenado.

【Silencioso Mouse de 5 DPI con Teclado】 El mouse inalámbrico silencioso tiene 5 DPI (800/1200/1600/2000/2400). Es rápido y preciso, manténgase en silencio mientras mantiene la sensibilidad. La almohadilla de mouse adjunta te hace más cómodo usando el mouse. Las teclas del teclado del teclado de la oficina inalámbrica proporcionan menos ruido. La pulsación táctil ligera y receptiva hace que la escritura sea suave y cómoda.

【Diseño Súper Delgado y Portátil】 El teclado de la computadora inalámbrica está hecho por plástico ABS de alta calidad. Tiene 14.55x5.5x0.2in (37*14*0.5cm), 0.8in (2 cm) cuerpo ultra-slim, que puede ahorrar espacio y fácil de transportar. El elegante diseño de kit teclado y mouse inalámbrico es súper coincidente con el escritorio de oficina. Perfecto para traer para viajes de negocios, oficina, hogar, biblioteca u otras ocasiones públicas.

【Cubierta del Teclado+Batería Incluida con Garantía de 2 Años】 básicas de AA y AAA duraderas se incluyen en el teclado inalámbrico y la combinación de ratones, la duración de la batería entre 3 y 5 meses. La cubierta incluida puede proporcionarle una sensación de mecanografía cómoda y proteger su teclado del polvo y el líquido. Si el problema de calidad con el juego de teclado y mouse inalámbricos se produce dentro de los 2 años, reemplazaremos el nuevo para usted de forma gratuita.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Previous page
One USB, Two Devices 
Simplify your setup with our keyboard and mouse combo that shares a single USB receiver. Enjoy the convenience without sacrificing functionality. 
Silent Comfort Keyboard Combo 
Elevate your typing and clicking experience with our Silent Combo. Featuring a quiet keyboard with scissor-switch keys and a silent mouse, this set offers a peaceful environment for work or play. 
Ergonomic Keyboard & Mouse Set 
The keyboard's 7° tilt and mouse's ergonomic design offer optimal comfort and support, reducing strain during extended use. Upgrade to a healthier and more comfortable computing experience today. 
Adjustable DPI Mouse 
The wireless mouse equipped with 5 adjustable DPI settings: 800-1200-1600-2000-2400. Whether you need precise accuracy or swift movement, customize your mouse sensitivity to suit your needs. 
Next page
Previous page
Lightweight Keyboard and Mouse Combo 
Designed to be slim and lightweight for easy portability, our keyboard and mouse set effortlessly fit into your laptop bag, enhancing your mobile productivity. 
Wireless Convenience with Wide Compatibility 
Experience wireless convenience with this keyboard and mouse set, compatible with your PC, desktop computer, or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10/11 operating systems. 
Perfect Dimensions for Any Workspace 
The keyboard measures 14.55 x 5.5 x 0.2 inches, while the mouse is 4.3 x 2.25 x 0.95 inches. Designed to be lightweight and portable, this set is ideal for any workspace. 
Next page
Dustproof and Waterproof 
Wireless keyboard includes a free keyboard cover, which is durable and designed to protect your keyboard. It is dustproof and waterproof. 
Keyboard & Mouse Set with Mouse Pad 
Moojay Keyboard and mouse with a complimentary mouse pad. This all-in-one package ensures you're equipped with everything you need for smooth, precise control and added comfort during extended use. 
Keyboard with Indicator Lights 
Stay informed and in control with the clear intuitive LED lights that provide status updates on important functions such as power, connectivity. 
Included Batteries for Your Convenience 
Includes AA and AAA batteries. Designed with your convenience in mind, the mouse's USB receiver is stored in the mouse battery compartment for easy access. 
Does the wireless keyboard have function keys? 
Yes, the keyboard features 12 function keys, including FN+F1-12, providing instant access to various functions. 
What devices or systems are compatible with the keyboard and mouse combo? 
It is compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10/11 operating systems. It can be used with devices with USB slots, such as PCs, laptops, Macbooks, desktops, Chromebooks, and smart TVs. 
What should I do if the keyboard or mouse is not working? 
Ensure that the USB receiver is directly connected to the computer. If the issue persists, try reconnecting according to the instructions in the manual (pairing). 
Is there only one receiver for the keyboard and mouse? 
Yes, the KM50 keyboard and mouse share the same receiver, which is located at the bottom of the mouse. It's plug-and-play, and if you happen to lose the receiver or need a replacement, please refer to the user manual. 
Do the keyboard and mouse come with a sleep function? 
Yes, both the keyboard and mouse are equipped with an automatic sleep mode for power saving, and press any key to activate them.

title: Logitech G915 TKL Tenkeyless Lightspeed Wireless RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, Low Profile Switch Options, Lightsync RGB, Advanced Wireless and Bluetooth Support - Linear
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Gaming Keyboards
description: A cohesive, motivating story around the product in about 100 words. Explain as much as possible in the simplest way possible. Explain technical terms. If using acronyms, then spell out as well. This should be written in paragraph form, not a features list. G915 TKL is a new class of wireless mechanical gaming keyboard with three selections of low-profile GL switches and pro-grade 1 ms LIGHTSPEED wireless. Capable of delivering 40 hours of non-stop gaming on a full charge.. Fully customizable per-key, LIGHTSYNC RGB technology also reacts to in-game action, audio and screen color as you choose. With a sleek, impossibly thin yet durable and sturdy design, G915 TKL brings gamers to a higher dimension of play. Dedicated volume wheel and media keys give you fast, easy control over video, audio, and streaming.
features: LIGHTSPEED wireless delivers pro-grade performance with flexibility and freedom from cords. Creates a clean aesthetic for battlestations. Delivers 40 hours on a single full charge.
LIGHTSYNC technology provides RGB lighting that synchronizes lighting with any content. Personalize each key or create custom animations from ~16.8M colors with Logitech G HUB software.

Low Profile mechanical switches offers the speed, accuracy and performance of a mechanical switch at half the height The GL Linear switch features a completely smooth keystroke through the point of actuation. Comes in 3 options: GL Tactile, GL Linear or GL Clicky.
Tenkeyless design provides more room for mouse movement. Store the USB receiver in the back of the keyboard for additional portability.
Beautifully crafted, the G915 TKL uses aircraft-grade aluminum alloy to deliver incredibly thin but rigid and durable design.

Enjoy 40 hours of game time on a single charge. Low battery warnings at 15 percent on the keyboard battery LED and via pop-up notification in the Logitech G HUB software. Quickly recharges in 3 hours.
Dedicated media controls with a precision engineered, edgeless volume wheel provide convenient and easy control to quickly play, pause, skip or mute your media.
Connect to multiple devices uses LIGHTSPEED or Bluetooth. Toggle between high-performance LIGHTSPEED wireless via USB receiver and Bluetooth— quickly and easily.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
G915 TKL Tenkeyless 
Play the Next Dimension 
A breakthrough in design and engineering, the G915 TKL features a compact form factor, LIGHTSPEED pro-grade wireless, low-profile GL switches, and LIGHTSYNC RGB. Extreme performance is now tenkeyless. 
Previous page
LIGHTSPEED Wireless 
Pro-grade LIGHTSPEED wireless achieves super-fast 1 ms performance. G915 TKL is also fully functional when plugged in via USB, so you can charge and play simultaneously. 
Impossibly Thin 
G915 TKL is incredibly refined, impossibly thin, durable, and built with a no-compromise commitment to performance and feature set. It truly is the next generation of gaming mechanical keyboards. 
Advanced Low-Profile Mechanical Switches 
Three choices of low-profile GL mechanical switches provide the speed, accuracy and performance of traditional switches—at half the height. GL Linear delivers a completely smooth keystroke. 
LIGHTSYNC RGB 
Customize per-key lighting across approx. 16.8 million colors.* Create your own animations or choose from a selection of preset effects for the most immersive RGB experience. 
Next page
Previous page
Endless Control 
Sleek and sophisticated, G915 TKL offers a focused, high-performance experience with every feature you need to take total control—like onboard profiles and game mode.* 
Remarkable Battery Life 
Enjoy hours of non-stop game time on a single charge. Battery indicator light notifies you when the battery is low. Recharges in under four hours. Keep playing while it’s charging via micro USB. 
Dedicated Media Controls 
Onboard media controls are right at your fingertips. Dedicated controls quickly adjust volume, play/pause and skip music or videos, and mute audio instantly. 
Logitech G HUB Software 
Gain complete control over your gear and games. Customize lighting, create macros, fine-tune gear settings by game, connect to third-party apps like Discord and OBS, and much more. 
Next page
Complete Your Ultimate Wireless Gaming Setup 
Previous page
G903 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse 
Upgrade to competition-grade performance, speed and accuracy with our most advanced HERO 16K gaming sensor. 
LEARN MORE 
G935 Wireless Surround LIGHTSYNC Gaming Headset 
Hear your games in all their glory with advanced audio technology delivering our most expansive, detailed and immersive soundscapes ever. 
LEARN MORE 
Next page
Combine the G915 TKL keyboard with other top-of-the-line gaming gear from Logitech G for a complete and completely advanced setup meticulously designed for serious gamers.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Detachable Full Keyboard Size Wrist-Rest 
The detachable soft and comfortable wrist rest gives your hands more support, effectively reducing the fatigue of using the keyboard for long periods of time on your wrists, and you will feel more immersed in work or play. 
	
Customizable RGB Backlit 
The keyboard has a variety of customizable lighting modes that are easy to use. You can adjust the lighting effects according to your personal preferences to suit different usage scenarios, please refer to the user manual for specific adjustment methods. 
	
Never-faded Glowing Letters 
The keycaps are made of ABS double-shot injection molding process, and the letters on the keycaps are translucent, non-fading, sweat-resistant and other properties, effectively enhancing the durability of the keycaps. So you can easily find the desired key even in the dark. 
	
RGB Backlit 
16.8 million color RGB streamer magic light effect, excellent visual effects, gorgeous lighting effects, lightting up a competitive gaming atmosphere. 
	
Multi-button Mouse 
The 6D mouse has 2 buttons on the side and two independent forward and backward function buttons, making it more portable during use, effectively reduce hand movement distance, relieve hand fatigue. 
	
Professional Gaming Mouse 
Professional gaming mouse adopts optical sensor, with 7200DPI, scanning rate of 12000 FPS, 40G acceleration, tracking speed up to 400 IPS. 
	
How to use the Fn function? 
FN + Insert = Cyclic Mode ; FN + Delete = Streamer Mode ; FN + PgUp = Custom Mode ; FN + Home = Switch Color ; FN + End =Breathing Mode ; 
FN + PgDn = Turn Off Backlight ; FN + ↑↓ =Brightness Adjustment ; FN + →← = Breath Rate Adjustment 
How to customize RGB light? 
Press FN + PGUP twice to start customizing. 
FN + ( 1 - 6 ) : Change the color of the corresponding custom area. 
FN + PGUP : Save and complete.Restore default after power off. 
FN + W : Exchange WASD and arrow keys. 
FN + WIN : WIN key lock. 
FN + ( F1 - F12 ) : 12 multimedia combination keys.

title: Logitech Casa Pop Up Desk Work From Home Kit with Laptop Stand, Wireless Keyboard & Touchpad, Bluetooth, USB C Charging, for Laptop/MacBook (10” to 17”) - Windows, macOS, ChromeOS - Nordic Calm

description: Yoko Nordic Calm
features: *Laptop not included
My Work. My Life. My Home: With Casa Pop Up Desk, you decide where comfy, focused work happens in the home; when the workday is done, place this folding desk out of sight, out of mind
Make More Room for the Things You Love: With a keyboard, touchpad, laptop riser and storage all in one compact kit, you can enjoy every inch of your home office space
Great Work On Any Surface: Reach your full potential from anywhere in the home - be it a dining table, high countertop, or simply a corner that catches the sunrays
Laptop Days, 40% Comfier*: The book-like case unfolds into an ergonomic laptop stand, raising your screen to eye level for noticeably better posture, however long you need it
A Familiar Experience: Enjoy the laptop-like feel you know and love on Casa Keys and Casa Touch, the minimalist wireless keyboard and smooth wireless touchpad
For a Wide Range of Laptops: The laptop holder supports most laptops from 10” to 17”(2); plus, each device connects to multiple OS (Windows, macOS, iPadOS, ChromeOS) via Bluetooth Low Energy
Sustainability: Plastic parts in Casa Pop-Up Desk include certified post-consumer recycled plastic (3) (Touchpad: minimum 62%; Keyboard: minimum 47%; Book: minimum 44%)
Disclaimer: Uses FSC-certified paper for responsible packaging; certified carbon neutral

manufacturerAttributes.value: The plastic parts in Casa Pop-Up Desk include certified post-consumer recycled plastic*—minimum 62% for the touchpad, minimum 47% for the keyboard and minimum 44% for the book—to give a second life to end-of-life plastic from old consumers electronics and help reduce our carbon footprint.  *Excludes plastic in battery, printed wiring assembly (PWA), FFC cable, and packaging.

The paper packaging of Casa Pop-Up Desk (including product wrap) comes from FSC-certified forests and other controlled sources. By choosing this product, you are supporting responsible management of the world's forests.

Rest easy knowing that the carbon impact of your Casa Pop-Up Desk has been reduced to zero. That’s because beyond designing for sustainability, we also offset our residual impact by supporting forestry, renewables, and climate-impacted communities.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Previous page
GREAT WORK ANYWHERE 
From the bedroom to the kitchen, set up a little work stage anywhere you feel like it in the home. 
NEAT AND TIDY 
Make more room for home with a keyboard, touchpad, laptop stand and storage all in one compact kit. 
FOCUS ON HOME 
Finished with work? Pack Casa away in moments and put the workday out of sight, out of mind. 
Next page
WORK-FROM-HOME DAYS THAT FOLD AWAY 
1 SET UP ANYWHERE 2 DECLUTTER 3 FOLD WORK AWAY 
Previous page
CHOOSE FROM THREE COLORS TUNED TO THE HOME 
Casa Pop-Up Desk comes in three elegant colors that blend back into the home when work is done. Swipe through to find the one for you. 
NORDIC CALM 
A soft lilac accent brings sand-hued fabric to life on the Nordic Calm Casa Pop-Up Desk. Inside, enjoy Casa Keys and Casa Touch in sophisticated Off-White. 
BOHEMIAN BLUSH 
Get boho with a lush pastel pink fabric, accentuated with a vibrant rose strap. The Bohemian Blush Casa Pop-Up Desk includes Casa Keys and Casa Touch in Rose. 
CLASSIC CHIC 
A sophisticated duet of deep green and oil blue makes the Classic Chic Casa Pop-Up Desk sing. Includes Casa Keys and Casa Touch in Graphite. 
Next page
GET TO KNOW CASA BOOK 
Previous page
YOUR NECK, 40% COMFIER 
Did you know putting your laptop screen at eye level helps encourage better posture? Casa Book transforms into an ergonomic laptop stand, keeping you feeling strong and comfy for as long as you need. 
FROM WORK CLUTTER TO NEAT AND TIDY 
Each of Casa’s devices fits neatly in its own compartment and can be removed or repacked with a gentle click. There’s even an inbuilt compartment for small items such as charging cables or stationery. 
MADE FOR THE HOME 
Casa’s book-like exterior blends beautifully back into your home, accentuated by its highlight rubber strap. The wipeable fabric is easily cleaned, helping you keep Casa pristine for longer. 
Next page
GET TO KNOW CASA KEYS 
Previous page
TYPING YOU KNOW AND LOVE 
Typing feels second nature on Casa Keys, the wireless keyboard designed to feel like an enhanced laptop typing experience. 
SMALL FORM, PACKED WITH GOODNESS 
A minimalist form places all the keys you need at your fingertips, including Media Keys and Emoji. It also aligns your shoulders into a more natural posture. 
LONG-LASTING AND RECHARGEABLE 
Casa Keys’ battery lasts up to 5 months on a full charge. When it needs a top-up, the conveniently placed charging port means you can keep working as you power up. 
Next page
GET TO KNOW CASA TOUCH 
Previous page
YOUR PERSONAL TOUCH 
Wireless touchpad Casa Touch feels instantly familiar, with a silky glass surface and Click Anywhere technology for smooth, intuitive control. 
BUY TIME WITH TOUCH GESTURES (VIA LOGI OPTIONS+) 
Make more time in the day by using your touchpad gestures* such as swipe left or right to switch between desktops and full-screen apps. 
*Touchpad gestures enabled by installing the Logi Options+ app. 
ENDLESS CONTROL 
A full charge powers Casa Touch for up to 3 weeks, and you can keep using it whenever you need to plug it back in. 
Next page
COMPATIBLE WITH MOST LAPTOPS 
Casa’s laptop stand works for most laptops, from 10” to 17” and supports up to 7.5 kg (16.5 lbs)**. Plus, each device connects to multiple OS (Windows, macOS, ChromeOS, iPadOS) via Bluetooth Low Energy. 
**Excludes tablet laptops and laptops with non-square edges above 12mm 
MAKE THE CASA EXPERIENCE YOUR OWN 
Personalize your experience with a simple download of the Logi Options+ app***. From putting your favorite emoji at your fingertips, to changing shortcuts for work calls, our app keeps your day flowing smoothly. 
***Customize device by installing the Logi Options+ app for Windows or macOS.

title: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse,J JOYACCESS USB Slim Wireless Keyboard Mouse with Numeric Keypad Compatible with iMac Mac PC Laptop Tablet Computer Windows -Silver White
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Keyboards, Mice & Accessories › Keyboard & Mouse Combos
features: Slim and Stable Bulid: JOYACCESS wireless keyboard and mouse features a scissor-cross low profile layout. 15° tilt design numpad keyboard, increases the comfort of use and helps reduce stress. The keycaps are thin and flat, silver-white color keyboard mouse wireless with curved shape,saving office desktop space.

Easy to Set up to Your Device:Computer keyboard and mouse combo can be stably and easily connected within 10m.,which commonly use one nano receiver to connect with your computer. It doesn't need install any drivers, practical and user-friendly, plug and play. The nano receiver just snap in the storage of mouse near battery compartment.

Less Noise and Hign Precise: The keyboard's noise reduced keys and the silent click of the quiet mice will allow you to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment.You can easily change the cursor sensitivity of this cordless mouse depending on your needs.usually 1600 DPI for office, DPI 2000-2400 for 4K resolution monitor or entertainment like gaming at home.

Battery Saving: Wireless mouse will automatically sleep in power saving mode while not in use for about 20 seconds, and the compact wirless keyboard also come into sleep in 8 minutes if no typing. Keyboard mouse combo can be reactivated in milliseconds by clicking any key. batteries not included in package.

Wide Compatibility: JOYACCESS Keyboard mouse set is compatible with Windows 2000 / ME / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 12. Work well with Macbook, desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer Smart TV and more. Both keyboard and mouse give a world of silence and a morden desktop; great for conference, board presentation, library, coffee shop, night work, travel, etc.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Product Description 
Are you looking for a reliable companion who won't let you down in at work or in your home office? The CHERRY STREAM KEYBOARD is the perfect choice. 
The cable keyboard is particularly impressive thanks to the high-quality CHERRY SX scissor mechanism. This stands for excellent tactile typing feel and is particularly precise. The volume when typing on the USB keyboard has been reduced even further compared to the previous model. This makes the PC keyboard the first choice if you like to write quietly. 
Thanks to the integrated metal plate and the eight rubber pads on the underside, the STREAM KEYBOARD scores with ideal torsional stiffness, stability, and durability. 
The easy-to-read key labeling is abrasion-resistant and therefore remains legible even after a long time. The Office Keyboard also has ten practical additional keys for office and multimedia: Volume control, lock Windows, start calculator, etc. Three status LEDs built directly into the respective keys show at a glance whether CAPS LOCK, NUM, and SCROLL are activated. 
The keyboard has the GS seal "Tested Security." This certifies that it complies with all relevant European directives and regulations relating to health protection. In addition, the GS seal means that you can be sure that a standard layout is used for this keyboard. With the "Blue Angel" award, the CHERRY STREAM KEYBOARD meets the requirements for environmental, health, and usage properties. This means that from the production stage right through to the actual device itself, there is as little impact as possible on water, soil, air, and the environment as a whole. 
Discover the computer keyboard "CHERRY STREAM KEYBOARD" - perfect for frequent typists with the highest demands on quality and typing feel! 
Your search has an end 
Are you looking for a corded keyboard that meets particularly high standards of quality, reliability and typing feel? Then your search has come to an end here. The CHERRY STREAM KEYOBARD is the latest edition of the classic CHERRY STREAM 3.0, which has been tried and tested a million times over. 
The CHERRY STREAM KEYBOARD combines the highest quality standards with a mixture of conventional design and a touch of elegance, making it a faithful companion for a particularly wide range of tastes. 
Optimized for professional use in the office 
Torsional rigidity, stability, and non-slip properties characterize the cable keyboard. Thanks to the in-house and further developed SX scissor mechanism, it writes precisely and more quietly than the previous model. 
The corded keyboard is developed and designed in Germany. With a service life of up to 20 million operations, even frequent writers will get their money's worth. 
	
Work even more efficiently 
The 10 additional keys facilitate the operation of the most important office and media functions. The lock key puts your client into sleep mode and helps you to save power quickly and easily. 
Three status LEDs built directly into the buttons show quickly and easily when CAPS LOCK NUM or SCROLL is activated 
	
Protect the environment and your health! 
The CHERRY STREAM KEYBOARD has been awarded the "Blue Angel" and the "GS Seal" and thus fulfills the highest standards in terms of environmental, health, ergonomic, and usage properties.

title: RisoPhy Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, RGB 104 Keys Ultra-Slim LED Backlit USB Wired Keyboard with Blue Switch, Durable Abs Keycaps/Anti-Ghosting/Spill-Resistant Computer Keyboard for PC Mac Xbox Gamer
breadCrumbs: Video Games › Legacy Systems › Xbox Systems › Xbox › Accessories
features: 【Mechanical Keyboard: Responsive BLue Switches】RisoPhy PC keyboard features clicky keys which offer you higher accuracy and quicker response with an enjoyable click sound when typing.This keyboard is more comfortable to type on since it features deeper key travel,greater feedback,and more space between keys.For those who prefer keyboards with a more tactile and "clicky" feel,our keyboard with BLUE switches is a nice choice.

【Rainbow Backlit Keyboard: illuminate Your Desktop】With 9 different backlights,5 levels of light speed and brightness,this computer keyboard enriches your gaming experience and improves your mood greatly,which is a great addition to your desktop,especially in the dark.Plus,the ultra-durable double injection ABS engineered keycaps provide crystal clear uniform backlight and greatly improve your typing accuracy at night.

【High-end 104 Keys Full-Size Keyboard】The Win lock function frees your worry about mistyping when gaming(Fn+Win).Keycaps are pluggable and easy to clean,saving you much unnecessary trouble.We designed 4 hydrophobic holes for this keyboard,allowing water to flow away quickly to prevent damage to the keyboard.No longer afraid of accidents.(✦Include a keycaps puller for cleaning or other needs.)

【Advanced Ergonomic Comfort】This PC gamer Keyboard adopts a scientific stair-up keycap design that keeps your arms in the most natural state to minimize hand fatigue for long time use.In order to improve your posture and make you more comfortable during use,the wired keyboard comes with 2 strong foldable rear kickstands to slope it.Moreover,the keyboard is non-slip enough because there are 4 rubber padding underneath the keyboard.

【100% Anti-Ghosting & 12 Multimedia Combinations】100% anti-ghosting gaming keyboard allows all keys to work simultaneously,no matter how fast you type.12 multimedia key shortcuts allow you to quickly access to calculator/media/volume control/email.RisoPhy mechanical gaming keyboard with the number pad greatly improves your productivity.This ultra-durable keyboard with up to 50 million keystrokes life works well with Windows 7/8/10/XP/VISTA/95/98/XP/2000/ME/VISTA and Mac OS Xbox etc.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Quiet Wireless Mouse 
The wireless mouse features noiseless click technology, providing a quiet and peaceful working environment. This allows you to work or use the mouse in any setting without disturbing others around you. 
Low Consumption 
1 AA battery (NOT INCLUDED) is required for this mouse, it will turn to sleep mode in 10mins of inactivity for energy saving, and can be easily activated by clicking any buttons. USB nano receiver can be found on the back of the Mouse. 
Confortable & Responsive 
This wireless mouse offers a comfortable grip for extended use, and the advanced sensor ensures silent clicks & nice responsive. 
1600 DPI Wireless Mouse 
With a default DPI of 1600. It will turn to sleep mode in 10mins of inactivity for energy saving, and can be activated by clicking any buttons. 
Noiseless Click 
Quiet clicks free your worry about bothering others, and the click lifespan for left/right button would be 3,000,000 times. 
Plug & Play 
Super easy to set up, just take out the USB nano receiver from the back of the mouse, and plug to your computer, then you are ready to go!

How to switch the BT98 Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Connection Mode? 
Keyboard;To Switch it;Press FN+Q/W/E switch 3 BT mode, FN+R to 2.4G Wiresss FN+Y to Wired. 
Mouse;Wireless/BT/Wired,Please dial the switch on the back of the mouse to the position. 
Note;The 2.4G receiver storage compartment at the bottom of the mouse. 
How many lighting modes does this backlit keyboard mouse have? How to use the Multimedia Knob Control? 
Yes,The BT98 Triple Mode keyboard Mouse default lights is a RGB color and has 12 adjustable mode, Also you can change the 4-level brightness or 5-level breathing speed. 
Press FN+Click Knob then can switch multimedia/Backlit mode. 
How Can I change it or turn it off? 
Keyboard;FN+INS to change the Light Mode. FN+Left/Right(Arrow key) to adjust lights direction. 
FN+_-/+= PGUP/DOWN to change/turn off the brightness or breathing speed. 
Mouse;Press Bottom of the Mouse Light key to change the Light Mode.

The BT98 Keyboard Mouse essential Windows compatibility combines with 100% fully fits Mac OS.Take it easy to work or gaming at home. 
Press FN+TAB to switch Win/Mac system.The WIN or Mac indicator will flash Blue light. 
How long can it work on a full charge? and Is it compatible with Xbox PS4/5? 
Charge for 3-4 hours, the keyboard can work for 800 hours (Backlit off), 90 hours (max brightness).the mouse work for 400 hours (Backlitoff), 120 hours (Backlit on).365 days of standby time. 
the keyboard mouse works with Xbox One/S/360 PS4/5

title: memzuoix 2.4G Wireless Mouse, 1200 DPI Computer Mouse with USB Receiver, Portable Wireless USB Mouse Battery Powered Cordless Mouse for Laptop, PC, Desktop, 5 Buttons, Purple
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Keyboards, Mice & Accessories › Mice
features: 【MAXIMUM HAND-FEELING】 Modern contoured shape, sweat-resistant and skin-friendly finish are for maximum comfort and support. The thoughtful ring and little finger rest provide extra comfort. The sturdy scroll wheel with rubber makes sure that your hand will not slip when scrolling.

【PLUG & PLAY SUPER EASY TO USE】Really plug & play design, no drivers need to be installed. 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 43.0ft. Portable design make it easy to store in bag. It's the best mouse for a gifts.
【STRONG DURABILITY & LONG WORKING DISTANCE】Passed 6,000,000 times keystroke test to guarantee extra durability. 2.4GHz wireless technology and professional chip ensure longer working distance.

【EXTREMELY LOW POWER CONSUMPTION】 It takes 2 AAA Batteries(NOT Included) to operate this wireless mouse, and it will turn to sleep mode in 7mins of inactivity for energy saving, can be easily activated by clicking any buttons.

title: Keychron K10 Full Size Layout Bluetooth Wireless/USB Wired Mechanical Gaming Keyboard for Mac with Gateron G Pro Brown Switch/Multitasking/RGB Backlight 104 Keys Computer Keyboard for Windows Laptop
inStockText: In Stock  Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Gaming Keyboards
features: The Keychron K10 is a 104 keys full size RGB backlight Bluetooth mechanical keyboard made for Mac and Windows. Engineered to maximize your productivity with most popular full size layout with number pad.

With a unique Mac layout while compatible with Windows, the K10 has all essential multimedia and function keys you need (Num Lock works with Windows only), and comes with a dedicated Screenshot Key, Siri (Cortana) Key, and Screen Lock Key. Extra keycaps for both Mac and Windows operating systems are included.

Connects with up to 3 devices via the reliable Broadcom Bluetooth 5.1 chipset and switch among them easily for multitasking needs. The K10 is best to fit home, office and light gaming use while connecting with your smartphone, laptop and iPad. It also has wired mode with USB Type-C connection.

With the Gateron G Pro mechanical switch providing unrivaled tactile responsiveness on the Brown switch with up to 50 million durable keystroke lifespan. N-key rollover (NKRO) on wired mode or 6KRO on wireless mode.

The K10 can last up to 240 hours (with backlight off) with a 4000 mAh big battery, which is one of the biggest in mechanical keyboards. Two level adjustable feet (6º and 9º) and inclined bottom frame provides a great ergonomic support for long lasting typing comfort.

title: Lenovo Bluetooth Silent Mouse (WL300) - 5 Button Computer Mouse with Silent Left & Right Click – Sculpted Grip, Microsoft Swift Pair, Up to 1600 DPI (Grey)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Keyboards, Mice & Accessories › Mice
description: The WL300 Lenovo Bluetooth Silent Mouse takes a well-worn concept and turns it on its head, delivering a productivity device that doesn’t get in the way of the busy professionals who use it. It sculpted to be comfortable to rest your palm on, with a low-profile, minimalist design that makes the mouse easy to carry and fit into pockets without bulging. Get more done with the blue optical sensor that allows you to work on most surfaces, revolutionary, distraction-free silent buttons, and on-the-fly adjustable DPI controls. Effortlessly pair with up to two devices at once and quickly switch between them with the push of a button, thanks to Bluetooth 5.0 and Microsoft Swift Pair technology.
features: Sleek and Compact: Compact and lightweight, this mouse is ideal for on-the-go professionals and is powered by a single AA battery. Its design eliminates the hassle of tangled cables, providing the freedom to work in various environments

Uncompromised Quality: Built to withstand extensive use, the left and right buttons are engineered to last up to 3 million clicks. The scroll wheel is designed to endure up to 300,000 cycles, ensuring long-lasting durability and consistent performance

Sculpted Grip Bluetooth Mouse: Experience all-day comfort with a sculpted grip that conforms to your hand's natural contours, providing ergonomic support for extended periods of use. Effortlessly pair your device with Bluetooth 5.0 and Microsoft Swift Pair technology

Smooth Navigation: Maximize your workflow with a 5-button mouse featuring left click, right click, scroll click, forward, and backward buttons, coupled with an anti-slip scroll wheel. The precise optical sensor and 3-level DPI adjustment caters to various tasks, offering 800, 1200, and 1600 DPI

Silent Efficiency: Designed to work seamlessly on different surfaces such as wood, leather, fabric, paper, and resin, the WL300 offers silent left, right, and scroll wheel buttons, allowing for efficient and quiet operation

features: Ergonomic Design Wireless keyboard is ergonomically designed with folding holder and anti-slide pads that can keep it at an optimum slope, prevent your wrists from hurting while long sessions of typing.The wireless mouse in contoured shape would provide hours of work comfortably. features: Stable 2.4G Wireless Connection: Say goodbye to lag and interruptions with the advanced 2.4GHz wireless keyboard technology. You can rely on a stable, cordless keyboard connection up to 33 feet with minimal interference or dropouts, even in crowded wireless environments. Simply plug the USB receiver into your device and start typing — no drivers needed. Ideal for both home and office use.

Ultra-Slim Wireless Keyboard: Despite its compact size (16.12 x 4.7 x 0.79 inches), this keyboard offers the full functionality of a standard-sized keyboard, including dedicated arrow keys, a number pad, and customizable shortcuts. Enjoy comfortable and efficient typing in a sleek, space-saving design.

Long Battery Life with Power-Saving Mode: This K913 quiet wireless keyboard features an auto sleep function that activates after 15 minutes of inactivity to preserve battery life. Powered by 2 AAA batteries (included), it offers up to 12 months of usage on a single set of batteries. When you're ready to use it again, just press any key to wake it up and continue typing.

Wide Compatibility Across Devices: This versatile external keyboard for laptop and desktop users works seamlessly with Windows 11, Windows 10, Chrome OS, Linux, and Mac OS. Whether you’re using a Macbook, PC, or laptop, this wireless keyboard with number pad is the perfect addition to your setup, ensuring smooth and efficient typing no matter your operating system

Multimedia Shortcuts & Convenient Layout Enhance productivity with 12 multimedia shortcut keys and a full numeric keypad for easy data entry. While designed to be fully compatible with Windows systems, the keyboard also features a range of other 7shortcuts (Note: some may not be compatible with MAC systems). Perfect for both work and play, this USB wireless keyboard lets you access your most-used functions with a single touch.

New-Level of Comfort 
The keyboard's middle section is gently curved and includes palm support, as well as built-in kickstands for a slight tilt. These features enhance its ergonomic design, ensuring a more comfortable typing experience.

Solution For Keyboard/Mouse No Response 
Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; 
Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the ESC+K keys of the keyboard; 
Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. 
Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again. 
* Solution For Mouse 
Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; 
Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the middle button and the right button of the mouse; 
Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. 
Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again.

description: G515 LIGHTSPEED TKL gaming keyboard delivers a next-level, low-profile experience for all with sleek design and performance engineering. Tri-mode connectivity allows users to play with best-in-class LIGHTSPEED wireless, Bluetooth, and wired data mode. Pair compatible mice and LIGHTSPEED via the same USB with 2:1 pairing. Ultra slim, 22 mm height and tenkeyless design create a sleek aesthetic and offer ergonomic comfort. Low-profile GL mechanical switches are factory-lubed for quieter sound and faster actuation. Choose from tactile and linear. Double-shot PBT keycaps offer durability for the most intense moments of play and look as good as they perform with anti-oil design and premium feel. Sound dampening construction and foam layer absorb sound for quieter play. LIGHTSYNC RGB offers access to ~16.8 M colors to customize play, create themes, and sync other Logitech G gear in G HUB. Unlock full keyboard customization with KEYCONTROL technology. Map any key to make your keyboard the ultimate control center. Up to 36 hours of battery life allows you to focus on what matters: the win.

title: Keychron K10 Full Size 104 Keys Bluetooth Wireless/USB Wired Mechanical Gaming Keyboard for Mac with Gateron G Pro Brown Switch/RGB Backlight/Multitasking Computer Keyboard for Windows, Aluminum Frame
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Gaming Keyboards
features: The Keychron K10 is a 104 keys RGB backlight Bluetooth mechanical keyboard aluminum frame made for Mac and Windows. Engineered to maximize your productivity with most popular full size layout with number pad.

With a unique Mac layout while compatible with Windows, the K10 has all essential multimedia and function keys you need (Num Lock works with Windows only), and comes with a dedicated Screenshot Key, Siri (Cortana) Key, and Screen Lock Key. Extra keycaps for both Mac and Windows operating systems are included.

Connects with up to 3 devices via the reliable Broadcom Bluetooth 5.1 chipset and switch among them easily for multitasking needs. The K10 is best to fit home, office and light gaming use while connecting with your smartphone, laptop and iPad. It also has wired mode with USB Type-C connection.

With the Gateron G Pro mechanical switch providing unrivaled tactile responsiveness on the Brown switch with up to 50 million durable keystroke lifespan. N-key rollover (NKRO) on wired mode or 6KRO on wireless mode.

The K10 can last up to 240 hours (with backlight off) with a 4000 mAh big battery, which is one of the biggest in mechanical keyboards. Two level adjustable feet (6º and 9º) and inclined bottom frame provides a great ergonomic support for long lasting typing comfort.

features: 【Stable 2.4G Wireless Connection】Powerful and reliable connection of wireless keyboard mouse is up to 10 m(393.7in). Wireless keyboard with mouse combo share a Nano receiver (stored at the bottom of the mouse) without installing any additional software, plug and play. Keep your desk clean and tidy.

【Efficient Desktop Keyboard Wireless + Wide Compatibility】The wireless computer keyboard preserving the keys of the numeric keypad, the full-size keyboard has 12 function keys allows you to quickly access the music/volume/mail, etc(The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac System). Work well with devices which has USB slot like PC, Laptop, Macbook, desktop, Chrome-book, Smart TV.

【Silent Keyboard and Mouse】The wireless office keyboard’s scissor switch keys provide less noise. Light and responsive tactile keystroke makes typing soft and comfortable. Silent cordless mouse with adjustable DPI, with a default setting of 1600 DPI, allowing you to adjust the DPI speed to your preference. It is fast and precise, keep quiet while maintaining sensitivity. Never worry about disturbing others to rest while working or playing.

Kit keyboard and mouse wireless’s sleek design is super match with office desk. Perfect for business travel, office, home, library and many public occasions.

【Battery Included + Keyboard Cover】 Long-lasting basic AA and AAA batteries are included in the wireless keyboard and mice combo, battery life between 3 and 5 months(varies by usage conditions). 【Conexión Inalámbrica Estable de 2.4G】La conexión potente y confiable del mouse con teclado inalámbrico es de hasta 10 m (393.7in). El combo de teclado inalámbrico con mouse comparte un receptor Nano (almacenado en la parte inferior del mouse) sin instalar ningún software adicional, plug and play. 【Teclado de Escritorio Eficiente Inalámbrico + Amplia Compatibilidad】El teclado ordenador inalámbrico que conserva las teclas del teclado numérico y el teclado de tamaño completo. 【Teclado y Ratón Silenciosos】Las teclas del interruptor de tijera del teclado de oficina inalámbrico proporcionan menos ruido. La pulsación de tecla táctil ligera y sensible hace que escribir sea suave y cómodo. Ratón inalámbrico silencioso con DPI ajustables, con una configuración predeterminada de 1600 DPI. Es rápido y preciso, guarda silencio mientras mantiene la sensibilidad. Nunca se preocupe por molestar a los demás para que descansen mientras trabaja o juega.

【Diseño Ultradelgado y Portátil】 El teclado inalámbrico PC tiene un cuerpo de plástico ABS ultrafino de 14.55x5.5x0.8in (37 * 14 * 2cm), 0.8in (2cm), que puede ahorrar espacio y es fácil de transportar. El elegante diseño del kit de teclado y mouse inalámbricos combina perfectamente con el escritorio de la oficina. Perfecto para viajes de negocios, oficina, hogar, biblioteca y muchas ocasiones públicas.

【Batería Incluida + Cubierta del Teclado�� Se incluyen baterías AA y AAA básicas de larga duración en el combo de teclado y mouse inalámbricos, la duración de la batería es de entre 3 y 5 meses (varía según las condiciones de uso). aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Previous page
Ultra-Silent Keyboard and Mouse Combo for Laptop 
Wireless keyboard featuring silent scissor switches, providing you with a quieter typing experience. Mouse is also designed to operate silently, allowing you to work or play without disturbing others. 
Adjustable DPI Mouse (Default1600) 
Wireless mouse features DPI levels, allowing you to choose your preferred cursor movement speed. Whether you prefer a slower or faster cursor speed, you can enjoy precise and smooth navigation. 
Next page
Previous page
Compact and Portable Keyboard and Mouse Combo 
Designed to be slim and small for easy carrying. It conveniently fits into your laptop bag, making it perfect for on-the-go productivity. 
Ergonomic Keyboard Mouse Set for Comfortable Use 
Provides a comfortable keyboard angles and mouse arc. The carefully crafted design ensures a natural and comfortable hand position, reducing strain and fatigue. 
Next page
Previous page
Wireless Convenience with Wide Compatibility 
Experience wireless convenience with this keyboard and mouse set, compatible with your PC, desktop computer, or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 operating systems. 
One USB for Keyboard and Mouse 
Wireless keyboard and silent mouse share a single USB receiver, saving device ports without the need for complex setups. Plug and play for instant convenience, making your work more efficient. 
Next page
Dustproof and Waterproof 
Wireless keyboard combo includes a free keyboard cover, which is durable and designed to protect your keyboard. It is dustproof and waterproof. 
Keyboard with Indicator Lights 
Stay informed and in control with the clear intuitive LED lights that provide status updates on important functions such as power, connectivity. 
Non-Slip Silicone Pad 
The usb keyboard comes with non-slip silicone pads on the bottom. It can keep your laptop keyboard stable and bring a comfortable typing experience. 
Long Battery Life 
Wireless keyboard is powered by 2 AA battery, while the computer mouse requires 2 AAA batteries. They are included in the package. 
Do the keyboard and mouse come with a sleep function? 
Yes, both the keyboard and mouse are equipped with an automatic sleep mode for power saving, and press any key to activate them. 
Is there only one receiver for the keyboard and mouse? 
Yes, the KM9000 keyboard and mouse share the same receiver, which is located at the bottom of the mouse. It's plug-and-play, and if you happen to lose the receiver or need a replacement, please refer to the user manual. 
What should I do if the keyboard or mouse is not working? 
Ensure that the USB receiver is directly connected to the computer. If the issue persists, try reconnecting according to the instructions in the manual (pairing). 
What devices or systems are compatible with the keyboard and mouse combo? 
It is compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10/11 operating systems. It can be used with devices with USB slots, such as PCs, laptops, Macbooks, desktops, Chromebooks, and smart TVs. 
Does the wireless keyboard have function keys? 
Yes, the keyboard features 12 function keys, including FN+F1-12, providing instant access to various functions.

items.title: Wireless Convenience with Wide Compatibility
items.text: Experience wireless convenience with this keyboard and mouse set, compatible with your PC, desktop computer, or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 operating systems.

items.title: One USB for Keyboard and Mouse
items.text: Wireless keyboard and silent mouse share a single USB receiver, saving device ports without the need for complex setups. Plug and play for instant convenience, making your work more efficient.

items.title: Dustproof and Waterproof
items.text: Wireless keyboard combo includes a free keyboard cover, which is durable and designed to protect your keyboard. It is dustproof and waterproof.

items.title: Keyboard with Indicator Lights
items.text: Stay informed and in control with the clear intuitive LED lights that provide status updates on important functions such as power, connectivity.

items.title: Non-Slip Silicone Pad
items.text: The usb keyboard comes with non-slip silicone pads on the bottom. It can keep your laptop keyboard stable and bring a comfortable typing experience.

items.title: Long Battery Life
items.text: Wireless keyboard is powered by 2 AA battery, while the computer mouse requires 2 AAA batteries. They are included in the package.

items.name: Do the keyboard and mouse come with a sleep function?
items.text: Yes, both the keyboard and mouse are equipped with an automatic sleep mode for power saving, and press any key to activate them.

items.name: Is there only one receiver for the keyboard and mouse?
items.text: Yes, the KM9000 keyboard and mouse share the same receiver, which is located at the bottom of the mouse. It's plug-and-play, and if you happen to lose the receiver or need a replacement, please refer to the user manual.

items.name: What should I do if the keyboard or mouse is not working?
items.text: Ensure that the USB receiver is directly connected to the computer. If the issue persists, try reconnecting according to the instructions in the manual (pairing).

items.name: What devices or systems are compatible with the keyboard and mouse combo?
items.text: It is compatible with Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10/11 operating systems. It can be used with devices with USB slots, such as PCs, laptops, Macbooks, desktops, Chromebooks, and smart TVs.

items.name: Does the wireless keyboard have function keys?
items.text: Yes, the keyboard features 12 function keys, including FN+F1-12, providing instant access to various functions.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers like the appearance of the keyboard mouse set. They mention it looks nice, the color is amazing, and it's quiet. Customers also appreciate the size, quietness, and ease of setup. However, some customers have reported that the key locations on this keyboard are off compared to a standard keyboard. Opinions are mixed on functionality, value for money, and quality.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
What You Can Get: 
* 1x Full-size Wireless Keyboard 
* 1x Wireless Mouse 
* 1x USB Receiver (Stored in the mouse) 
* 2*AA battery 
Retro Keyboard and Mouse Wireless 
* Solution For Mouse 
Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; 
Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the middle button and the right button of the mouse; 
Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. 
Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again. 
* Solution For Keyboard 
Step 1: To take out the battery and USB receiver; 
Step 2: Turn it ON, press and hold on the ESC+K keys of the keyboard; 
Step 3: Inserting the receiver within 10 seconds, then let it go for 5 seconds. 
Tips: If plug the USB over 10s ,it need to restart from step 2 again.

How do I use the wireless keyboard and mouse after I receive it? 
After putting in usable 2 AA batteries(keyboard*1 mouse*1), turn on the switch at the bottom (the light is lit), plug the USB receiver into your computer, and you can start to experience the typewriter keyboard to you! 
What if the keyboard and mouse don't work one day? 
Reinsert the USB receiver(Keep the keyboard mouse as close to the computer as possible), Put in the available batteries, and re-match the computer including restarting your computer to try. If it still doesn't work, Contact the seller immediately! 
What if the USB receiver is lost? 
Whether the product originally did not come with a receiver, or you lost it during use, please contact the seller immediately to solve for you!

title: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac, Compact Wireless Bluetooth Mouse, 8K DPI Any-Surface Tracking, Quiet Clicks, USB C, Wireless Mouse for MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, iMac, iPad - Space Grey
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Keyboards, Mice & Accessories › Mice
description: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac, a compact USB C mouse optimized for macOS & iPadOS (9), with a compact shape, matching Apple finishes, and a design that blends into your Apple setup. Logitech wireless mouse has next-level precision and control, now with 8K DPI any-surface tracking (1) and Quiet Clicks so you can master your work anywhere. Product Details: Height: 100.5 mm Width: 65 mm Depth: 34.4 mm Weight: 99g Compatible with, macOS, iPadOS operating systems (9) Rechargeable Li-Po (500 mAh) battery. Get three hours of use from a one-minute quick charge (8). Sensor technology: Darkfield high precision Buttons: 6 buttons (Left/Right-click, Back/Forward, Wheel mode-shift, Middle click) Scroll Wheel: Yes, with auto-shift Horizontal scroll: Yes, by holding the side button while turning the wheel Wireless Connectivity: Bluetooth low energy Additional wireless compatibility of this device only with Logi Bolt receivers (not included).
features: Mastered For Mac: With matching Apple finishes, Logi Options+ functions for macOS (7), USB-C charging, MX Anywhere 3S for Mac makes for a perfect fit with your Apple setup
Designed For Mac: This Logitech Bluetooth mouse is fully compatible with Apple MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, iMac, and iPad models
Tracks Anywhere, Goes Everywhere: Work on any surface, even glass (1), with MX Anywhere 3S wireless mouse; now with an 8K DPI sensor so you can cover more ground with subtle movement
Deeper Flow With Quiet Clicks: MX Anywhere 3S Logitech wireless mouse introduces quiet clicks, the same satisfying feel but with less click noise for less distraction and more focus
Scroll 1,000 Lines Per Second: Logitech mouse with MagSpeed, Logitech’s fastest (5) and most precise (4) scroll wheel; fast enough to scroll 1,000 lines a second, precise enough to stop on a pixel
Connect To Multiple Apple Devices: Pair with up to 3 devices on macOS, iPadOS via Bluetooth Low Energy (2)
Optimize Workflow With Bluetooth Mouse for Mac: Work uninterrupted across Apple devices, set tracking speed, customize buttons, and use ready-made app-specific customizations with Logi Options+ (7)
Made With Recycled Plastic: Plastic parts in MX Anywhere 3S for Mac include certified post-consumer recycled plastic, 78% for Space Gray and 61% for Pale Grey (10)

attributes.value: User Documentation, MX Anywhere 3S for Mac, Charging Cable

manufacturerAttributes.value: The plastic parts in MX Anywhere 3S for Mac include post-consumer recycled plastic — 78% for Space Gray and 61% for Pale Grey* — to give a second life to end-of-life plastic from old consumer electronics and help reduce our carbon footprint.  *Excludes plastic in printed wiring assembly (PWA), cables, and packaging.

The paper packaging of MX Anywhere 3S for Mac comes from FSC-certified forests and other controlled sources. By choosing this product, you are supporting responsible management of the world’s forests.

MX Anywhere 3S for Mac is certified carbon neutral. This means the carbon impact of the product and packaging has been reduced to zero due to Logitech’s investment in carbon-offsetting and removal projects.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Designed for Mac 
MX Anywhere 3S for Mac is optimized for macOS & iPadOS(1), with a compact shape, matching Apple finishes and a design that blends into your Apple setup. 
(1) Device basic functions will be supported without app for operating systems other than macOS. 
Track anywhere, even glass (2) 
It’s Logitech’s most accurate sensor ever, that’s faster and 5x more precise than the basic mouse. 8k DPI tracking with customizable sensitivity means you can cover more ground with subtle movements. 
(2) 4 mm minimum glass thickness. 
Scroll 1,000 lines per second & stop on a pixel 
The Magspeed scroll wheel is precise enough to stop on a pixel and quick enough to scroll 1,000 lines per second. 90% more speed and 87% more precision with its 2 modes: ratchet & hyper fast scroll. 
Deeper flow with quiet clicks 
The same satisfying click feel but with less noise (than MX Anywhere 3 for Mac) for less distraction and more focus 
Work comfortably from anywhere 
With a compact, low-profile design contoured for the shape of your hand, you’ll be comfortable for hours no matter where you work 
Optimize your workflow 
Customize buttons, set tracking speed, and use predefined app-specific customizations to optimize your workflow with Logi Options+ app. 
Connect with up to 3 devices 
Easily switch between up to 3 Apple devices at the push of a button. Compatible with macOS and iPadOS. 
Multi computer, one flow 
Pair MX AnyWhere 3S for Mac to type on multiple Apple computers - and transfer text, images and files between them. Requires Logi Options+ app. 
Seamless wireless connectivity 
Work with stable and reliable connectivity via Bluetooth Low Energy, now upgraded to Logitech’s highest Bluetooth connectivity standard. 
Pair with MX Keys Mini for Mac 
Laptop-like typing made even better with keys shaped for your fingertips and smart illumination on a compact keyboard. 
USB-C quick charging 
Stays powered for up to 70 days on a full charge (battery may vary based on user). Charge while you work: 1 min of quick charge for 3 hours of use.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
FOPETT Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo 
2.4GHz Wireless Technology plug and play, 35 feet working range, 2-in-1 nano receiver, no need to install other software, no delays or Drop the line, Make your desk surface more neat and tidy, Keyboard or mouse can be used separately, just insert a single USB Receiver to use your Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo! 
Wide Compatible 
The wirelss combo support operatingsystems with USB2.0 port,such as Windows 2000，XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10，Mac OS, Smart TV and more. (Note: Hotkeys function may not fully compatible with Mac, OS System) 
	
Plug & Play Wireless Receiver 
No drive needed, Simply plug the included wireless receiver into your computer’s USB port, it install automatically. Both wireless keyboard and mouse will be connected in the same time,and start using your keyboard and mouse without software to install. 
	
Keyboard Shortcuts 
FN+ESC : Music Player FN+F1 : Player/ Pause FN+F2 : Previous One FN+F3 : Next One FN+F4 : Volume+ FN+F5 : Volume- FN+F6 : Mute FN+F7 : Web FN+F8 : Search FN+F9 : Favorites FN+F10 : Email FN+F11 : Lock FN+F12 : Windows 
	
Install Instructions 
Open the battery case, insert the battery to the case of keyboard and mice, One AA battery for the mouse, One AA battery for the keyboard( battery included).
Cover the battery case and remove the receiver.
Insert the receiver into the computer USB interface, wait a minute and you can use this combo immediately.
	
MOUSE with Adjustable DPI 
The mouse offers 3 adjustable DPI levels(800-1200-1600) for you to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse to meet your different requirements. 
	
Feel-good Typing 
This wireless combo cradles your hands in comfort to help minimize hand and wrist strain,even after spending all day at your computer.

modules.title: FOPETT Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo
modules.text: 2.4GHz Wireless Technology plug and play, 35 feet working range, 2-in-1 nano receiver, no need to install other software, no delays or Drop the line, Make your desk surface more neat and tidy, Keyboard or mouse can be used separately, just insert a single USB Receiver to use your Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo!

items.title: Wide Compatible
items.text: The wirelss combo support operatingsystems with USB2.0 port,such as Windows 2000，XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10，Mac OS, Smart TV and more. (Note: Hotkeys function may not fully compatible with Mac, OS System)

items.title: Plug & Play Wireless Receiver
items.text: No drive needed, Simply plug the included wireless receiver into your computer’s USB port, it install automatically. Both wireless keyboard and mouse will be connected in the same time,and start using your keyboard and mouse without software to install.

items.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
items.text: FN+ESC : Music Player FN+F1 : Player/ Pause FN+F2 : Previous One FN+F3 : Next One FN+F4 : Volume+ FN+F5 : Volume- FN+F6 : Mute FN+F7 : Web FN+F8 : Search FN+F9 : Favorites FN+F10 : Email FN+F11 : Lock FN+F12 : Windows

items.title: Install Instructions
items.text:
Open the battery case, insert the battery to the case of keyboard and mice, One AA battery for the mouse, One AA battery for the keyboard( battery included).
Cover the battery case and remove the receiver.
Insert the receiver into the computer USB interface, wait a minute and you can use this combo immediately.

items.title: MOUSE with Adjustable DPI
items.text: The mouse offers 3 adjustable DPI levels(800-1200-1600) for you to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse to meet your different requirements.

items.title: Feel-good Typing
items.text: This wireless combo cradles your hands in comfort to help minimize hand and wrist strain,even after spending all day at your computer.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers like the color, quality, and ease of use of the keyboard mouse set. They mention it adds a touch of fun and color to their dental room. Some appreciate the weighty feel of the keys and say it's responsive. Customers are also happy with the feel and ease of typing. However, some customers differ on functionality, noise level, and value for money.

OPTICAL VERTICAL MOUSE - HEALTHY MOUSE 
This ergonomic mouse is full of vitality, innovation, and has many health benefits. By changing the way you use your wrist and arms, you will effectively reduce pain and discomfort. 
Compatible Systems : 
Windows 2000 
Windows XP 
Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 
Linux , Android 
( Note: The previous/next page thumb buttons are not recognized on the Mac OS X ) 

Recommanded Charging Way: 
Please Use 5V-1A/2A Wall Charger + Lekvey USB-A to C Cable to Charge the Mouse 
Please DON'T Charge the Mouse via Hubs, Laptops or Computers as they Don't Meet 5V-1A/2A
Sleek and Rechargeable : 
Built-in High-Capacity Rechargeable Battery 
Turn heads with a futuristic design. 
Made for increased functionality and comfort, this rechargeable vertical mouse combines a handshake grip. 
Batteries no longer need to be replaced frequently. 
Recharge Quick-connect design allows you to switch from wireless to a charging cable connection so you never run out of power. 
Very Convenient -- Built-in rechargeable battery, you no longer need to buy batteries. 
Easy To Use -- One nano USB receiver at the bottom of the mouse, Just Plug and Play 
Comfortable and classy： 
Tired of using the traditional grip? Take a break from overly-clunky or uncomfortably tiny mice. The ergonomically-designed thumb rests and grips fit the contour of your palm for maximum comfort. 
Easy-access use： 
Six buttons give you improved control over your computer's systems. Whether dragging and dropping, selecting large volumes of data, or casually gaming, this mouse provides a low-cost, effective solution for multiple computing needs. 
Vertical Mouse Specification： 
Connection Mode: Wireless 2.4 GHz USB 
Item Weight：95 g / 0.21 lb. Item Dimension：5.0 x 3.0 x 2.5 inch 
Sensitivity: 3 DPI modes: 800-1200-1600 Adjustable 
Package Contents： 
1 x Lekvey Vertical Ergonomic Optical Wireless Mouse 
1 x 2.4 GHz USB receiver ( USB Receiver is at the bottom of the mouse ) 
1 x 150 cm Charging cable
